0.description: The American Coot is a large, water-loving bird with a distinctive lobed foot that helps it swim with grace and agility
0.name: American Coot

1.description: The American Goldfinch (Breeding Male) is a small, vibrant yellow bird with a cheerful song and a fondness for thistle seeds
1.name: American Goldfinch (Breeding Male)

2.description: The American Goldfinch (Female/Nonbreeding Male) is a small bird with a duller yellow-brown plumage and a delicate appetite for seeds
2.name: American Goldfinch (Female/Nonbreeding Male)

3.description: The Barred Owl is a nocturnal bird with a distinctive hooting call and striking dark eyes, often found in wooded areas
3.name: Barred Owl

4.description: The Black Phoebe is a small, sooty-colored bird with a sleek appearance and a preference for perching near water
4.name: Black Phoebe

5.description: The Black-and-white Warbler is a small bird with striking black and white stripes, known for its distinctive habit of creeping along tree trunks
5.name: Black-and-white Warbler

6.description: The Black-throated Green Warbler is a small, active bird with a bright green back and a contrasting black throat, often found in coniferous forests
6.name: Black-throated Green Warbler

7.description: The Blue Jay is a medium-sized bird with vibrant blue feathers and a loud, jay-jay call, known for its intelligence and complex social behaviors
7.name: Blue Jay

8.description: The Blue-gray Gnatcatcher is a tiny, agile bird with a distinctive blue-gray color and a thin, long tail, often seen flitting through tree branches
8.name: Blue-gray Gnatcatcher

9.description: The Brewer's Blackbird (Male) is a medium-sized bird with a glossy black plumage and a distinctive yellow eye, often found in open areas
9.name: Brewers Blackbird (Male)

10.description: The Bushtit is a tiny, social bird with a fluffy appearance and a penchant for traveling in flocks, often seen in wooded areas
10.name: Bushtit

11.description: The Carolina Wren is a small, energetic bird with a distinctive white eyebrow stripe and a loud, teakettle-teakettle call
11.name: Carolina Wren

12.description: The Chipping Sparrow (Breeding) is a small bird with a distinctive rufous cap and a clear, trilling song, often seen in open woodlands
12.name: Chipping Sparrow (Breeding)

13.description: The Common Tern is a medium-sized seabird with a slender body and a graceful flight, known for its striking black cap and red bill
13.name: Common Tern

14.description: The Common Yellowthroat (Adult Male) is a small warbler with a bright yellow throat and a distinctive black mask, often found in marshy areas
14.name: Common Yellowthroat (Adult Male)

15.description: The Eastern Kingbird is a medium-sized bird with a bold black-and-white plumage and an aggressive nature, often seen perching conspicuously
15.name: Eastern Kingbird

16.description: The Eastern Phoebe is a small, plump bird with a distinctive tail-wagging habit and a soft, phoebe call, often found near water
16.name: Eastern Phoebe

17.description: The Forster's Tern is a medium-sized seabird with a slender body and a graceful flight, known for its distinctive black cap and white underparts
17.name: Forsters Tern

18.description: The Hermit Thrush is a small, brown bird with a distinctive reddish tail and a melodious, flute-like song, often found in wooded areas
18.name: Hermit Thrush

19.description: The Lesser Yellowlegs is a medium-sized shorebird with long, bright yellow legs and a slender bill, often seen wading in shallow water
19.name: Lesser Yellowlegs

20.description: The Little Blue Heron (Adult) is a medium-sized wading bird with a slate-blue plumage and a distinctive pale blue bill, often found in marshes
20.name: Little Blue Heron (Adult)

21.description: The Mallard (Breeding male) is a large duck with a glossy green head and a distinctive white neck ring, often seen in ponds and lakes
21.name: Mallard (Breeding male)

22.description: The Northern Cardinal (Adult Male) is a medium-sized bird with a vibrant red plumage and a distinctive crest, often seen in gardens and woodlands
22.name: Northern Cardinal (Adult Male)

23.description: The Northern Harrier (Female/immature) is a medium-sized raptor with a distinctive white rump patch and an owl-like facial disc, often seen gliding low over fields
23.name: Northern Harrier (Female/immature)

24.description: The Northern Mockingbird is a medium-sized bird with a grayish plumage and a remarkable ability to mimic the songs of other birds
24.name: Northern Mockingbird

25.description: The Northern Shoveler (Breeding male) is a medium-sized duck with a distinctive spoon-shaped bill and striking plumage
25.name: Northern Shoveler (Breeding male)

26.description: The Prairie Warbler is a small, active bird with a bright yellow underside and distinctive black streaks on its face
26.name: Prairie Warbler

27.description: The Red-bellied Woodpecker is a medium-sized bird with striking black-and-white barred plumage and a distinctive red cap
27.name: Red-bellied Woodpecker

28.description: The Red-breasted Nuthatch is a small, agile bird with a distinctive red breast and a fondness for climbing down tree trunks headfirst
28.name: Red-breasted Nuthatch

29.description: The Red-tailed Hawk (Light morph adult) is a large raptor with a distinctive red tail and broad wings, often seen soaring in open areas
29.name: Red-tailed Hawk (Light morph adult)

30.description: The Red-winged Blackbird (Female/juvenile) is a medium-sized bird with a streaked brown plumage and a distinctive call
30.name: Red-winged Blackbird (Female/juvenile)

31.description: The Rose-breasted Grosbeak (Adult Male) is a medium-sized bird with striking black-and-white plumage and a bright red chest
31.name: Rose-breasted Grosbeak (Adult Male)

32.description: The Ruby-crowned Kinglet is a tiny, energetic bird with a distinctive red crown that is often hidden, known for its rapid wing-flicking
32.name: Ruby-crowned Kinglet

33.description: The Short-billed Dowitcher is a medium-sized shorebird with a long, straight bill and a distinctive sewing machine-like feeding style
33.name: Short-billed Dowitcher

34.description: The Song Sparrow is a small, streaked bird with a distinctive melodic song and a broad geographic range across North America
34.name: Song Sparrow

35.description: The Western Meadowlark is a medium-sized bird with striking yellow underparts and a distinctive black V on its chest, known for its beautiful song
35.name: Western Meadowlark

36.description: The White-breasted Nuthatch is a small, agile bird with a distinctive white breast and a habit of climbing down tree trunks headfirst
36.name: White-breasted Nuthatch

37.description: The White-crowned Sparrow (Adult) is a medium-sized sparrow with distinctive black and white stripes on its head and a clear, whistled song
37.name: White-crowned Sparrow (Adult)

38.description: The Wild Turkey is a large, ground-dwelling bird with a fan-shaped tail and a distinctive gobbling call, often seen in flocks
38.name: Wild Turkey

39.description: The Wilson's Warbler is a small, energetic bird with a bright yellow body and a distinctive black cap, often found in dense undergrowth
39.name: Wilsons Warbler
